name: Joy Reyes-Madamba
text: Hi Weng, curious lang. Someone somewhere said that given that 5 of the justices there have already accused Sereno in Congress, shouldn't they have recused themselves from the QW decision using the same reason that you said?

source_obj.text: Hi Weng, curious lang. Someone somewhere said that given that 5 of the justices there have already accused Sereno in Congress, shouldn't they have recused themselves from the QW decision using the same reason that you said?
